definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Antiperspirants come in a range of strengths, both over-the-counter and prescription.
sentences.chinese: 止汗劑有不同的強度，分爲處方的和非處方的兩種。

sentences.english: Using antiperspirants is the easiest way to treat sweating.
sentences.chinese: 使用止汗劑是處理多汗症最簡便的方法。

sentences.english: Reviewed the research progress of antiperspirants in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 綜述止汗劑近年來的研究進展。

sentences.english: Stop using antiperspirants and switch to natural deodorants.
sentences.chinese: 停止使用止汗劑，轉向天然的除臭劑。

sentences.english: Apply roll-on antiperspirant to the bite.The itching should stop almost immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在叮咬處塗一些止汗劑後，瘙癢感幾乎立刻就消失了。

definition: to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
